<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: public class IteratorWrapper<T> implements Enumeration {
Iterator<T> iterator;
public IteratorWrapper(Iterator<T> iterator){
this.iterator = iterator;
}
public boolean hasMoreElements(){
return iterator.hasNext();
}
//Return generic Type T
public T nextElement(){
return iterator.next();
}
}

}

Answer: This is a generic implementation of an IteratorWrapper class that implements the Enumeration interface. The class takes a generic type parameter T, which can be any type that implements the Iterator interface. The class provides methods to check if there are more elements and retrieve the next element in the iteration. The class can be used with any type of iterator that implements the Iterator interface.
